directions: Heat a skillet over medium heat. Spread butter onto one side of a piece of bread and place butter side  down in the skillet. Place one piece of cheese on top of the bread, then sprinkle with brown sugar. Top with the other slice of cheese. Butter the other slice of bread and place on top with the butter side up. Fry on each side until golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes per side.
title: Sweet Grilled Cheese
